::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(summarytools)
library(readxl)
library(lubridate)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE)
```
:::


We will be reading the debt excel sheet


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
debt <- read_excel('_data/debt_in_trillions.xlsx')
debt
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

### Briefly describe the data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
debt_new <- debt %>%
  mutate(date = parse_date_time(`Year and Quarter`, orders="yq"))
debt_new
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

## Time Dependent Visualization


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
debt_new %>% 
  ggplot(aes(date,Total)) +
  geom_point(size=.5) +
  geom_line() 
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](challenge6_AdithyaParupudi_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

Not sure about this part. Have to study on this more.
